Option Name: Detailed Example: Pool, Natural Gas Heater, 90% Usage Multiplier
Detailed Example: Pool, 2700 kWh/yr Pump, Unheated
Detailed Example: Pool, 2700 kWh/yr Pump, 500 therms/yr Natural Gas Heater
Pump Annual Energy Use: The annual energy consumption of the pool pump.
Pump Usage Multiplier: Multiplier on the pool pump energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.
Heater Type: The type of pool heater.
Heater Annual Electricity Use: The annual electricity consumption of the pool heater.
Heater Annual Natural Gas Use: The annual natural gas consumption of the pool heater.
Heater Usage Multiplier: Multiplier on the pool heater energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.
